languages.text: В колонии расцвел культ смерти. Путем кровавых жертв и самоистязаний его члены доводят себя и окружающих до религиозного исступления. Вести об их кровавых актах веры вселяют тревогу.

traits.locale_text: В колонии расцвел культ смерти. Путем кровавых жертв и самоистязаний они доводят себя и окружающих до религиозного исступления. Вести об их кровавых актах веры вселяют тревогу.

languages.text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.
languages.original_text: В колонии расцвел культ смерти. Путем кровавых жертв и самоистязаний его члены доводят себя и окружающих до религиозного исступления. Вести об их кровавых актах веры вселяют тревогу.

traits.locale_text: A Death Cult flourishes in the colony, driving its members to the brink of frenzy with bloody sacrifices and self-flagellations. News of their bloody deeds bring uncertainty and fear.

A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

languages.text: 某个死亡教派正在殖民地上不断扩大规模。那些邪教徒通过血腥的牺牲与自我鞭笞，将所有成员与其他人推向宗教狂热的边缘。他们血腥行径的传闻，激发了人们的怀疑与恐惧。
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

traits.locale_text: 某个死亡教派正在殖民地上不断扩大规模。那些邪教徒通过血腥的牺牲与自我鞭笞，将所有成员与其他人推向宗教狂热的边缘。他们血腥行径的传闻，激发了人们的怀疑与恐惧。

languages.text: Un culto de la Muerte ha prosperado en la colonia, llevando a sus miembros y a otros al borde del frenesí religioso a través de sacrificios de sangre y autoflagelaciones. Las noticias de sus sangrientos actos siembran la preocupación y el miedo.
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

traits.locale_text: Un culto de la Muerte ha prosperado en la colonia, llevando a sus miembros y a otros al borde del frenesí religioso a través de sacrificios de sangre y autoflagelaciones. Las noticias de sus sangrientos actos siembran la preocupación y el miedo.

languages.text: コロニーでは死のカルトが隆盛を極めており、血塗られた生贄と自虐的な行為により信者や他の人々を宗教狂いの淵に追いやっている。彼らの血なまぐさい活動は不安と恐怖をもたらしている。
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

traits.locale_text: コロニーでは死のカルトが隆盛を極めており、血塗られた生贄と自虐的な行為により信者や他の人々を宗教狂いの淵に追いやっている。彼らの血なまぐさい活動は不安と恐怖をもたらしている。

languages.text: In der Kolonie ist ein Todeskult aufgeblüht, der seine Mitglieder und andere durch blutige Opfer und Selbstgeißelung an den Rand eines religiösen Eifers treibt. Die Nachrichten von den blutigen Taten des Kults säen Unsicherheit und Furcht.
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

traits.locale_text: In der Kolonie ist ein Todeskult aufgeblüht, der seine Mitglieder und andere durch blutige Opfer und Selbstgeißelung an den Rand eines religiösen Eifers treibt. Die Nachrichten von den blutigen Taten des Kults säen Unsicherheit und Furcht.

languages.text: Un culte de la mort a prospéré dans la colonie et a poussé ses membres et d'autres colons à s'adonner à des rituels fanatiques comme des sacrifices et de l'auto-flagellation. Leurs coutumes sanglantes effraient le reste de la population.
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.

traits.locale_text: Un culte de la mort a prospéré dans la colonie et a poussé ses membres et d'autres colons à s'adonner à des rituels fanatiques comme des sacrifices et de l'auto-flagellation. Leurs coutumes sanglantes effraient le reste de la population.

languages.text: Kolonide bir ölüm tarikatı filizlenmiş. Tarikat mensupları ve diğer kimseler, kanlı kurban törenlerine katılıp kendilerini cezalandırarak bu dinî çılgınlığın parçası oluyor. Bu vukuatlar duyuldukça korku ve kaygı da yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: A death cult has flourished in the colony, driving its members and others to the brink of religious frenzy through bloody sacrifices and self-flagellation. News of their bloody deeds brings uncertainty and fear.
